description: Explore the intersection of NFTs and patents, examining the legal implications and opportunities of this dynamic space. Learn how digital assets like NFTs impact the world of patents, and discover case studies and emerging practices such as those pioneered by IBM.
keywords: NFTs, patents, intellectual property, blockchain, digital assets, IP monetization, smart contracts, legal challenges, regulatory uncertainty, NFT market, IBM blockchain solutions
title: Exploring the Synergy Between NFTs and Patents
